EmailTemplate.name: 18-CSP-VoLTE-Email-Technical nurture-T0022J.Email 3 - Brochure
EmailTemplate.subject: Proven ways to evolve VoLTE to the cloud
EmailTemplate.textOnly: ${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Real world performance with Nokia Cloud-enabled VoLTE Nokia was among the first to deploy VoLTE as a Virtual Network Function. Almost all new VoLTE deployments will be in the cloud so take the opportunity to evolve your network for the future. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia’s networks business or its third-party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
